article_title: Year After Cigarette Ban, CVS Says 95 Million Fewer Packs Sold At 'All Retailers'

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: One year after CVS Health (CVS) stopped selling tobacco products, the pharmacy giant says it put a rare dent in U.S. tobacco sales, reducing purchases of cigarette packs by at least 95 million at "all retailers," according to a new analysis of retail market data. Aside from taxes on cigarettes and advertising [...]
